Add new gesture
Sandbox

Instructions

  1. Enter the gesture name
  2. Place your hand in the working area of the LeapMotion controller
  3. Draw the gesture you want to add. Make sure that LeapMotion has recognized the position of the fingers and the palm correctly
  4. Use your free hand to press the Space bar to save the gesture configuration
  5. Repeat the steps 2-4 at least 10 times (I personally take 40 measurements) while adding minor deviations (small palm turns, some changes in the fingers position)
  6. Press the Add button to add the gesture into the SandBox mode
